"Open regedit, search for ?AlternateVerticalSyncThreshold?. Unless you have multiple Ubi games installed, it should immediately give you PoP?s registry key. It should look something like Software->Ubisoft->Prince of Persia ? The Forgotten Sands->1.000000000->Engine

"GUYS!
I found a solution for 3 summoners bug!!!
Download the h4×0r trainer named:
?Prince_of_Persia_The_Forgotten_Sands_v1.0_+_6_Trainer?
1. Start it
2. Start the game and start playing
3. Play the game and get to the closed door with no enemies left
4. Stand next to the door.
5. Enable the trainer with ?Insert? button, and save your position with ?NUMPAD6?
6. From the menu load the last checkpoint
7. Right when the animation starts with the 3 summoners load your position with ?NUMPAD7?

I've tried it and it's working, I finished the game a while ago :mrgreen: . Btw: the final fight is really easy, It should be harder even on the easy difficulty level.

I found a nice "bug" - I'm using the Skidrow crackfix repack.

Anyway, anytime you get enough xp for an upgrade, DON'T immediately add something - do the following:

1) wait until you reach a save point
2) add some upgrade
3) exit after saving your changes
4) immediately kill yourself somehow
5) you'll be back at the save point - go back into the upgrade screen and the old upgrade has saved, but the upgrade point you used for it is back! use it again!

Let me know if this worked for you too...

Works. Make sure you download the crackfix! Though it still has some errors. Some doors that are supposed to close don't close and some doors disappear, but they appear when they open so it isn't a big deal. There's some bugs regarding to grapping pillars and wallrunning solid water, but only in the end part of the game.

The crackfix never causes you to become stuck, but you may miss one the puzzless in the end because a big door doesnt close when it should close. It makes the game easier, but I would have liked to complete the puzzle.
One more thing: certain abilities (greater freeze time and double health from vases and fights) were not unlockable.
